item.title: Scalable Server 02 Load Balancing
item.description:
In the previous post Scalable Server 01 Auto Scaling , it was mentioned that we need to configure a set of Load Balancers to distribute internet requests to different server hosts.
This allows us to dynamically adjust the number of hosts based on traffic and maintain stable service operations.
